option.name: interface.name
option.description: Interface name of your device you want to sniff.

option.name: interface.mac
option.description: Interface's MAC address of your device you want to sniff.

option.name: save_to.path
option.description: Where to save files. The files are about how much data each device used.

option.name: executables.screen
option.description: The executable file of the 'screen' command. It can be either the command name absolutely or the path to the command file.

option.name: executables.tcpdump
option.description: The executable file of the 'tcpdump' command. It can be either the command name absolutely or the path to the command file.

option.name: backup.dir
option.description: Where to backup files inside inside 'save_to.path' (i.e. path is relative).

option.name: backup.timeout
option.description: Take a backup from files in once in this no. of seconds.

option.name: logs.screen
option.description: Log outputs from running files inside the 'logs' directory or not.

option.name: logs.skipped_packets
option.description: Log outputs from sniffer file about which packets skipped.
